cause.description:
Amnesty International is using satellite cameras to monitor highly vulnerable villages in war-torn Darfur, Sudan. The human rights organization is inviting ordinary people worldwide to monitor 12 villages by visiting the Eyes on Darfur project website (www.eyesondarfur.org) and put the Sudanese Government on notice that these and other areas in the region are being watched around the clock.
1. www.eyesondarfur.org
cause.mission: Make Members of Facebook aware of another current genocide
cause.name: Eyes on Darfur
